changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_cooldown_effect') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_cooldown_effect GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.remove_cooldown_effect @character_id dbo.id_t, @effect_script_type TINYINT, @spell_group TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DELETE FROM dbo.Cooldown_Effect_Infos WHERE character_id = @character_id AND effect_script_type = @effect_script_type AND spell_group = @spell_group
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_cooldown_effect') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_cooldown_effect GO
